law.catch_line: This subtitle does not apply to an excavation or demolition performed or to be performed by an owner...
law.text:
This subtitle does not apply to an excavation or demolition performed or to be performed by an owner or lessee of a private residence when the excavation or demolition is performed or to be performed:
entirely on the land on which the private residence of the owner or lessee is located; and
without the use of machinery.
